attributes.action: The US Government admits to Cannabis curing cancer, cant it be legal in the UK?
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.healthyfoodhouse.com/u-s-government-finally-admits-marijuana-really-kill-cancer-cells/
https://www.cancer.gov/about-cancer/treatment/cam/patient/cannabis-pdq
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/northamerica/usa/11820620/US-government-says-cannabis-kills-cancer-cells.html

Hope this is enough to hopefully legalise cannabis in the U.K.
attributes.background: The US government have admitted that marijuana does in fact kill cancer cells, the UK have been concidering legalising cannabis, now there is a factual solution to enable cannabis to be legalised in the UK
